item.title: Timoth√©e Chalamet on table tennis, his twenties and his love of... Susan Boyle
item.description: The US actor is tipped for an Oscar nomination for his portrayal of table tennis star Marty Mauser.

item.title: Weight-loss jab ads banned for exploiting body insecurities
item.description: Three social media adverts are found to be irresponsible, with one targeting new mums.

item.title: Boy, 15, charged with murder of girl, 9, as police name victim
item.description: The teenager appears in court after the death of Aria Thorpe at a house in Weston-super-Mare.

item.title: Left-wing candidate beats Starmer ally to lead UK's biggest union
item.description: Andrea Egan, who was expelled from Labour three years ago, replaces Unison's current general secretary Christina McAnea.

item.title: Streeting 'deeply regrets' doctors' strike as five-day walkout begins
item.description: British Medical Association members started the 14th walkout over pay in England at 07:00 on Wednesday.
